programme.title: Wipeout USA S8
programme.desc: Follows the three rounds and three-stage, obstacle course consisting of multiple strategy and decision points designed to further challenge, and wear out, the stamina of the competitors. Hosted by John Cena, Nicole Byer, and Camille Kostek.

programme.title: Weather Gone Viral S6
programme.desc: The episodes cover the most extreme weather action caught on camera. We learn from survivors who have beaten the odds to overcome the most treacherous weather conditions imaginable. The series also shows how for on-air meteorologists, being on the front lines of Mother Nature is never easy and sometimes the reporter covering the story becomes the story.

programme.title: Wild Scandinavia
programme.desc: Explore the dramatic landscapes, stunning wildlife and unique culture of Scandinavia - the land of Odin and Thor. Travels up the majestic fjords of the wild Atlantic Ocean, where deep ocean trenches bring strange sea creatures to the coast and puffins burrow in the snow. In the Scandinavian forests, Sami herders strive to feed their reindeers, and ravens and eagles compete to survive.

programme.title: Survivor 44
programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Moley follows the misadventures of an optimistic young mole, as he travels the tunnels of his secret underground realm and falls into lots of good-natured trouble along the way. programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures
programme.desc: In his latest set of adventures, Andy travels to all corners of the globe, meeting an amazing new cast of animals - from chameleons in Sri Lanka to emperor penguins in Antarctica. Accompanied by tech wizard Jen and new information-seeking AI Scout, Andy travels the globe in a hi-tech expedition truck, a scientific research station that houses Jen's database of incredible facts about fauna and flora that inhabit our planet. In each episode, the team are sent on a mission by HQ to solve a puzzle.

programme.title: Zero Hero
programme.desc: A weekly half hour series revolving around a Singaporean superhero family, The Magnificent Heroes, who have mysteriously lost all their super powers and now struggle to be like the average human being. Facing daily problems of homework, rudeness, pollution, office politics, busybody neighbours, bullying, peer pressure, relationships, the list is endless. Every week, a super villain from their past resurfaces, and it's up to our superheroes with no super powers to foil them.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: This series celebrates regular Singaporeans making an impact in quiet ways. From responding to cardiac arrest cases to being a good Samaritan on the roads.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Adina suspects that Rosnani and Zaryn have been lying to her about their hospital visits. Deanna worries when Kenneth appears unable to speak honestly with their children about the topic of death. Meanwhile, the Shelleys discuss how to proceed after learning the truth about Ella's parents.

programme.title: Freshly Picked With Simon Toohey S2
programme.desc: Get started today with a Japanese favourite that's fresh and easy. Simon shows how to get the best out of some old veggies, and Monica Mignone tops off the most decadent chocolate cake.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S1
programme.desc: In each episode, Adam Liaw is joined by 2 special guests - a combination of celebrity chefs, cooks and well-known personalities - and together they cook up a variety of dishes that centre around a nightly theme. They cook together sharing their knowledge, tips and tricks of the trade, for viewers to watch and follow their recipes at home. The Cook Up showcases all your favourite chefs, celebrities, culture, food and fun.

programme.title: America's Got Talent S18
programme.desc: With an astronomical number of loyal fans eager to find out what's in store, judges Simon Cowell, Howie Mandel, Heidi Klum and Sofia Vergara - and host Terry Crews - are back with more diverse talent and show-stopping moments than ever before. With contestants of all backgrounds and ages competing for the life-changing, million dollar prize, we follow the hopeful performers, from singers and dancers to comedians, magicians and more, on their incredible journeys.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: Kisses From Death
programme.desc: Death takes Addison aside and reveals their past life story to her. He shares about his past life as Damien, a house boy in this same mansion, where he fell in love with a maid named Ida, who was Addison in that life time. When Ida betrayed Damien and chose the Master over him, he was overcome with anger and grief. He poisoned Ida and the Master before finally taking his life, swearing to take revenge on Ida and make her suffer for eternity...

programme.title: Fire Country S1
programme.desc: After a hiker falls from a steep cliff, Bode and Jake put aside their differences to make a daring rescue. Also, Sharon reveals devasting news to Bode.

programme.title: Slow Dancing
programme.desc: Isla is billionaire Kaden's fake fiance. Kaden is suffering from temporary blindness and thinks he's still dating his real fiance, Evangeline, who's actually buried six-feet underground. In her quest to free Kaden from the ghosts of the past and the danger and threats of the present, Isla is aided by her friends and allies. But she is no damsel in distress, only a heroine with good sense and a pure heart.

programme.title: World Sailing Show
programme.desc: The World Sailing Show is the official international sailing series of the sailing federation World Sailing and is a monthly digest of everything that matters in the sport. From Olympic sailing to the round the world races and the America's Cup, the show includes personality profiles of the top players and technical features from the cutting edge of the sport where the access provided behind the scenes at major events is unparalleled.

programme.title: 长相思
programme.desc: 地牢中，沐斐架不住玱玹的威胁，交代了一切。玱玹坚决否认小夭是赤宸的女儿，心里却暗暗起疑。丰隆答应对小夭的身世疑点保密，并为玱玹锁定了其余凶手。然而凶手与中原大氏族勾连颇深，氏族承诺玱玹，若放过凶手就与他结盟相助。丰隆与馨悦劝玱玹答应，玱玹却说争王位的目的就是保护家人，他绝不会牺牲小夭。五王和七王为刺杀小夭的氏族求情，被西炎王斥责。阿念得知小夭遇害一事十分气愤，皓翎王命蓐收在皓翎境内要严惩几个参与刺杀的氏族.

programme.desc: 因为疫情，不少朋友已数年未有外游。泰国曼谷向来是大家的旅游热点之一，阔别近三年，大家或已对当地感到陌生。三位「女神」高海宁、彭慧中、陈星妤联同「少年食神」林澄光率先探路，穿梭曼谷的大街小巷，发掘隐世地道美食与打卡景点。近年流行素食，主持们也会化身「找素」达人，介绍曼谷的滋味素食。游泰国当然不能错过「叹SPA」，女神们会亲身上阵体验各式SPA，务求为观众揭开最高CP值的叹世界攻略.

programme.title: 好睡好起
programme.desc: 《好睡好起》，颠覆大家对睡眠世界的想像，全城启动睡眠模式！家家有本难「睡」的经，「数绵羊」有科学根据？ 「睡眠债」怎样还？走进睡眠实验室，嘉宾「瞓身」参与，一觉醒来，有何惊人发现？人人会睡，但未必个个睡得好，想睡得好，要从睡前做起。从今天开始，大家《好睡好起》.

programme.title: 长相思
programme.desc: 玱玹放走禺疆，在辰荣山给小夭种了一片凤凰林，希望等凤凰树成林、凤凰花开的时候，小夭能够回来。相柳为小夭疗伤，陪她看月亮，给她讲自己的故事。小夭的神识听着相柳的讲述，和相柳说了他千言万语，相柳却听不到。三十七年过去了，涂山璟一直昏迷不醒、药食不进，如今性命垂危。相柳唤醒小夭，将小夭送回了辰荣，自己却躲开了；小夭挥泪告别，相柳将她留下的眼泪变成珍珠。玱玹得知小夭醒来，精心准备房间迎接她回来，小夭却先去了辰荣府询问涂山璟的情况.

programme.title: 老友万岁

programme.title: 长相思
programme.desc: (PG) 小夭惊醒，看到眼前的玱玹顿时红了眼眶。玱玹收起情绪，怪小夭没有第一时间来见他。小夭哄好玱玹，玱玹勉强同意小夭等涂山璟醒了再回辰荣山。相柳四处找珍贵原料，给小夭锻造最好的弓箭。禺疆成为玱玹属下，禀告粮草危机。夜里，小夭偷偷跑到涂山璟榻边陪他。阿念得知小夭醒来，装作不在乎的样子，却把自己珍贵的灵药送给她。在小夭的悉心照顾下，璟终于醒来。他紧紧抱着小夭，想要放弃涂山璟的身份只要能和她在一起。璟解决玱玹的粮草危机，并向丰隆坦白自己与小夭的关系；丰隆又惊又怒，打了他一拳。.

programme.title: 秘食中国 (Ep 17-30)
